nodes.text: Blizzard Force unit two-two-eight-seven was a unit that served in the Galactic Empire's Blizzard Force on the Outer Rim planet Hoth in 3 ABY. The unit's numerical designation was acquired by the defecting Imperial Governor Everi Chalis, who used the unit's identity, along with the ruse of having taken a captured rebel shuttle, to escape the Imperial blockade on the planet shortly after the Battle of Hoth concluded.
Blizzard Force unit two-two-eight-seven was first mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
